attr.title: Zeroptian Invasion
attr.desc: Zeroptian Invasion is a classic shoot 'em up with mechanics from other arcades of the 80s. Travel back in time with this unique pixilated experience with an incredible soundtrack in chiptune.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on itch.io (https://josyan.itch.io/zeroptian-invasion), download the ZeroptianInvasion_itchio.zip version, extract it and copy the game files to the port's gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [itch.io](https://josyan.itch.io/zeroptian-invasion), download the *ZeroptianInvasion\_itchio.zip* version, extract it and copy the game files to the port's *gamedata* folder.
